snippet: Seventeen police officers were convicted of kidnapping and killing a man, 22, and could face the death penalty when they are sentenced on Monday, Indian officials said.
abstract: Seventeen Indian police officers are convicted of kidnapping and killing Ranbir Singh, 22-year-old man in custody in 2009, and may face death penalty when they are sentenced.
lead_paragraph: Seventeen police officers were convicted of kidnapping and killing a man, 22, and could face the death penalty when they are sentenced on Monday, Indian officials said.

headline.main: India: Officers Convicted in Man’s Death
headline.print_headline: India: Officers Convicted in Man’s Death
